tool_description: API to shorten and manage your links. Supports custom domains and analytics.
name: Blanq
title: Blanq

api_list.name: getUserDetails
api_list.description: Get account level information about the user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blanq2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/user"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blanq2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getUrlDetails
api_list.description: Pass domain and backhalf to retrieve information about a short link.

required_parameters.name: backhalf
required_parameters.description: Backhalf or slug of your short link

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Your custom domain without http, www and https
